title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: The New Package Wizard in the application displays a confusing message when the package name field is empty. The user is prompted with the message 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' at the top of the wizard, even though the package name field is empty.
OB: When using the New Package Wizard without entering any package name, a message 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' is displayed.
EB: When using the New Package Wizard without entering any package name, no message should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the New Package Wizard.
2. Leave the package name field empty.
3. Observe that no message should be displayed.
